  DUE TO INADEQUATE ATTENDANCE, THE STUDENT IS REQUIRED TO MEET THE PRINCIPAL / VICE-PRINCIPAL AS PER THE SCHEDULE DISPLAYED ON THE COLLEGE NOTICE BOARD
 
 
As required by the University of Mumbai, Circular No. UG/502 of 1996 dated 6th October, 1999, referring to Ordinances 119, 119A and 120 regarding the minimum attendance necessary for keeping terms, you are hereby required to have, in each subject, a minimum attendance of 75% of the theory lectures, practicals and tutorials (wherever prescribed) separately out of the total number of lectures, practicals and tutorials in the subject conducted in the semester
 
  Attendance for Sports / Cultural Activities will be taken into account only at the end of each semester.

St. Xavier's College, Mumbai-India.
